title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Drops 3% Over Weekend as All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Hedera (HBAR) fell 10.8% and Sui (SUI) declined 10.2%, leading the index lower.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2496.42, down 3.0% (-78.53) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BTC (-1.4%) and BCH (-1.9%).

Laggards: HBAR (-10.8%) and SUI (-10.2%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The entire CoinDesk 20 Index dropped 3% with all 20 assets trading lower, led by significant declines in HBAR (-10.8%) and SUI (-10.2%).
